page.document:
#class ofMaterial

<!-- visible: True advanced: False istemplated: False extends: ofBaseMaterial -->

##InlineDescription

material parameter properties that can be applied to vertices in the OpenGL lighting model used in determining both the intensity and color of reflected light based on the lighting model in use and if the vertices are on a front or back sided face

##Description

page.raw:
#class ofMaterial


<!--
_visible: True_
_advanced: False_
_istemplated: False_
_extends: ofBaseMaterial_
-->

##InlineDescription


material parameter properties that can be applied to vertices in the OpenGL lighting model
used in determining both the intensity and color of reflected light based on the lighting model in use
and if the vertices are on a front or back sided face





##Description
